channel.title: Can't See When Other Players Teleport, Please Help
channel.description: Lets say two players go to ::teampk. They both walk north 6 steps into the wildy. They begin to fight each other. One of the players puts in ::teampk again and teleports backwards 6 steps. Now to the other player, it appears he is still in the wildy, meaning it doesn't update the position of the player on the other player's screen. So it appears to the other player that this player is still in the wildy but he isn't. The only way to fix is kicking him but I don't like doing that every time. How can I fix this problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2008, 11:27:25 pm[/size][hr]Yeah lets totally view it and not help and just help everyone else...

item.title: Can't See When Other Players Teleport, Please Help
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Lets say two players go to ::teampk. They both walk north 6 steps into the wildy. They begin to fight each other. One of the players puts in ::teampk again and teleports backwards 6 steps. Now to the other player, it appears he is still in the wildy, meaning it doesn’t update the position of the player on the other player’s screen. So it appears to the other player that this player is still in the wildy but he isn’t. The only way to fix is kicking him but I don’t like doing that every time. How can I fix this problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2008, 11:27:25 pm[/size][hr]Yeah lets totally view it and not help and just help everyone else…
